@graph.name: How to Create and Optimize Shopify Collections
@graph.description: Complete step-by-step guide to creating, setting up, and optimizing Shopify collections for maximum sales impact.

step.name: Access Collections in Shopify Admin
step.text: Log into your Shopify admin dashboard and navigate to Products > Collections > Create collection

step.name: Choose Collection Type
step.text: Select between manual collection (hand-picked products) or automated collection (rule-based product grouping)

step.name: Set Collection Conditions
step.text: For automated collections, define conditions using product tags, titles, or price ranges. For manual collections, individually select products.

step.name: Optimize Collection Page
step.text: Customize collection page design, add featured images, set up filters, and ensure mobile optimization

step.name: Analyze and Improve
step.text: Monitor collection performance using analytics, track conversion rates, and make data-driven improvements

mainEntity.name: What's the difference between manual and automated Shopify collections?

acceptedAnswer.text: Manual collections require you to add products individually, giving you complete control over product selection. Automated collections use conditions like product tags or titles to automatically group products, saving time and dynamically updating as you add new products.

mainEntity.name: How do I set up automated collections in Shopify?

acceptedAnswer.text: In the Create collection screen, select 'Automated' and define conditions such as product tags, product title, or price range. These conditions tell Shopify which products to include automatically.

mainEntity.name: What are the best practices for organizing Shopify collections?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use intuitive names, highlight best sellers and promotional offers, regularly update collections, optimize for mobile users, use high-quality images, and structure collections to guide customer journey from broad to specific items.

mainEntity.name: How can I use Shopify collections to boost sales?

acceptedAnswer.text: Place best-selling products at the top, use clear filters and sort options, create seasonal collections, implement smart collection rules, and analyze performance data to optimize underperforming collections.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Manual Collections
hasDefinedTerm.description: Collections where products are individually selected and added by the store owner, providing complete control over product selection.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Automated Collections

hasDefinedTerm.name: Smart Collections
hasDefinedTerm.description: Advanced automated collections that update in real-time based on dynamic criteria and product data.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Collection Conditions

hasDefinedTerm.name: Product Tags
hasDefinedTerm.description: Labels assigned to products that help organize and categorize items for collection automation and filtering.
